snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Friends Reveal How He Deals With Hollywood Protecting Amber
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp's Friends Reveal How He Deals With Hollywood Protecting Amber 
Johnny Depp’s friends have come forward to reveal how the star is doing after getting canceled by Hollywood. Not only has Depp recently spoken about the cancel culture and his own mistreatment by Hollywood, but his friend Greg Ellis has also had something to say about the matter. Johnny made no secret of the fact that his life has taken a huge shift ever since his former wife drowned him with allegations. But how well justified is Johnny’s treatment and how true are the allegations? Let’s have a look at Depp’s life post-boycott as per his own friends.

Here on Film Streak we are all about the latest spill in Hollywood! You can rest assure that we will bring you all the latest celebrity drama and gossip especially concerning you favorite actors! We´ll also make sure to keep you updated on the newest movie updates and releases – so if you are interested in anything that happens in Hollywood, you should make sure to stay tuned!  

And there you have it guys! We hope you enjoyed the video! If you did please consider leaving a like and telling us what you though in the comments!
